attributes.action: call for Professor David Nutt to be reinstated as head of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reinstate Professor David Nutt as the head of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs and call for the resignation of all of those who seek to undermine democracy in the UK by fabricating scientific lies for their own political ends.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
